title:
I wonder why Carolina Treet is so invisible in the Wilmington community?



I never see advertisements, and they never show their face at any of the Wilmington fairs or events...I find it strange.



Thanks.



http://www.carolinatreet.com/contact.asp
text:
Unfortunately that's a question we won't be answering. We commit
our resources to answering questions of a local nature that aren't
promotional. Since you already have the contact information for
Carolina Tweet, I would suggest you give them a call.
